analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd54661c39362c2f1137f42307036f5b75a722a20.sol#33)
imchain.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd54661c39362c2f1137f42307036f5b75a722a20.sol#60-61)
